basics.name: Prabath Wijethilaka
basics.label: B.Sc Engineering Undergraduate
basics.summary: Electronic & Telecommunication Engineering (ENTC) Undergraduate Student at University of Moratuwa. My interest areas are Digital Design, Computer Architecture, Internet of Things and Machine Learning.

work.name: Hydrolink
work.summary: Hydrolink is an innovative IoT device revolutionizing water tank management. We developed this project and subsequently received a grant from the World Bank to manufacture a small batch of units and create a market-ready product.Through this experience, I gained significant skills in business and project planning, as well as product marketing. Ultimately, we launched our website, www.hydrolink.lk, and won the championship at the SLIoT Challenge 2023. For more details visit www.hydrolink.lk .
highlights: Champions- SLIoT Challenge 2023

work.name: Electronic club -  University of Moratuwa
work.summary: Electronic club is the official student body in the Department of Electronic and Telecommunication Engineering, University of Moratuwa. The club is responsible for organizing various events and workshops to enhance the knowledge of the students in the department. As the Social Media Sub-coordinator, I was responsible for managing the social media platforms of the club and promoting the events and workshops organized by the club.

work.name: Aura Digital Labs
work.summary: Aura Digital Labs is a leading digital transformation consultancy, dedicated to empowering businesses of all sizes to thrive in the digital age. With a team of seasoned experts, we combine cutting-edge technology, strategic insights, and a customer-centric approach to deliver innovative solutions that drive growth and success.
highlights: Visit https://www.auradigitallabs.com/

projects.name: Processor Design and Implementation on a FPGA
projects.summary: This is an ongoing project for design and implement a single-cycle processor
highlights: Stage 1: 32-bit non-pipelined processor: single cycle processor
Stage 2: 32-bit pipelined processor design (using System Verilog)
Stage 3: Associative mapped cache memory

projects.name: Hardware accelerator for a Vision Transformer-based malware detection system on a VEGA Processor
projects.summary: This is an ongoing project of DVcon India Design Context 2024. This project is for Accelerating ViT-based malware detection on edge devices with VEGA AS1061 Processor, based on RISC-V ISA.
highlights: This project aims to deploy a ViT-based malware detection system on an edge device equipped with the VEGA AS1061 Processor
Stage 1 focuses on proposing a novel acceleration IP to enhance the ViT model’s inference performance on the VEGA Processor, ensuring effective malware detection in real-world scenarios.

projects.name: Project Hydrolink
projects.summary: A Complete IoT Device Revolutionizing Water Tank Management
highlights: Acomplete IoT device revolutionizing water tank management.
Arduino IDE, ESP Microcontroller, Google Firebase, Flutter, SolidWorks, Altium
For more Details, Visit www.hydrolink.lk

projects.name: Accumulator with AXI Stream and Output Sum on 7-Segment Display
projects.summary: This project is part of an assignment for a digital system design course. Developed a digital system that reads a stream of numbers via an AXI Stream interface, computes their sum, and displays the result on a pair of 7-segment displays.

projects.name: Design and Implementation of the NIOS II Soft Processor on an Altera Max 10 FPGA.
projects.summary: Designing a NIOS II processor system on an Altera Max 10 FPGA and developing a demo application
highlights: Ongoing

projects.name: Gazebo Robot Simulation
projects.summary: Robot Simulation Project using ROS2 Humble and Gazebo
highlights: Map a room and navigate the robot from one location to another, avoiding obstacles along the way. Additionally,perform object tracking
Gazebo, Ros2, Ubuntu, OpenCV

projects.name: Modular Software Development Project
projects.summary: Developed a full-stack web application as a submodule within a main company.
highlights: Integrating backend functionalities with frontend components to streamline operations.
Spring boot, Java, MongoDB, React, Postman, Rest API

projects.name: Point-to-Point Communication Design project
projects.summary: We implemented a secure and reliable point-to-point digital wireless communication system using SDR.
highlights: Our achievements include the successful transmission and reception of diverse data types, such as images, text, and real-time audio.
Python, GNU radio, MATLAB

projects.name: Industrial Portable Water Quality Measurement Device
projects.summary: Developed an industrial portable water quality measuring device using sensor technologies and a Mobile app.
highlights: Capable of accurately measuring four key parameters: pH, Turbidity, Conductivity, and Temperature.
Arduino-IDE, ESP-Microcontroller, Google Firebase, Flutter, SolidWorks, Altium

projects.name: UART Communication System Implementation on FPGA using Verilog
projects.summary: Implemented and tested a UART communication system on an FPGA using Verilog.
highlights: Utilized Quartus Lite for FPGA development and integrated Raspberry Pi for data input.
Verilog-HDL, Quartus Lite, FPGA, Raspberry-pi, Python

projects.name: Machine Learning Projects
highlights: DiabetesAI-Webproject
SMS spam detector
Stock prediction
Breast Cancer Wisconsin Diagnostic Predictor
– Cardiovascular Disease Predictor

projects.name: Analog Portable Audio Amplifier
projects.summary: We have designed a Portable Audio Amplifier using only analog components.
highlights: Our device is capable of amplifying audio input from any audio-generating device through three main sub-circuits:preamplifier, tone controller, and power amplifier. We’ve implemented the Baxandall passive tone controller.
Simulink, Proteus, LT-Spice, Altium, Solidworks

projects.name: Steer-Safe
projects.summary: A wearable device that utilizes machine learning and Electrooculography (EOG) signals to track a driver’s state of awareness in real-time
highlights: Steer Safe is a device which utilizes machine learning and electrooculography (EOG) signals to track a driver's state of awareness in real-time, providing early alerts and potentially saving lives.
Analog Filter, Radio Frequncy Communication, High Speed PCB Design, Raspberrypi, wearable biomedical device design, Machine learning(Classification)

projects.name: Hand Gesture Math Solver with AI
projects.summary: Developed using OpenCV and the Gemini API, this system allows users to write mathematical problems on the screen using hand gestures. The problem is then sent to the Gemini API, which processes it and returns the solution in real-time.
